metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5870 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Role "pg_signal_backend" can signal certain superuser processes

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5870` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libecpg-compat3 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
libecpg6 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
libpgtypes3 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
libpq5 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
postgresql-15 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
postgresql-client-15 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
postgresql-plperl-15 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
postgresql-plpython3-15 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
postgresql-pltcl-15 - 15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: postgresql-15 package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '15.5-0ubuntu0.23.10.1').
